input.sentences: the plants were picked from outside .
the vegetables were chopped before being put in a pan .
in the pan | we added some water .
we mixed the ingredients very well .
on the grill | we laid some fresh meat .
output.sentences: To start this easy recipe begin with the herb plants picked from your garden.
Put your vegetables in a pan, take care that they are chopped uniformly.
After two cups of water are added to the pan, place it in the oven.
Add the softened vegetables to the rest of the ingredients, making sure they are mixed well.
Serve with you favorite meat, laid on the grill till it is cooked to your taste.
